availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alfred Wallace Rutherford Harris (Jefferson County, Kentucky, merchant and Louisville city assessor.)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, merchant and city assessor. Mason County, Kentucky, native. Son of Edward Harris and Elizabeth Campbell Harris. Married to Mary Jane Dorothy Johnson Harris in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on August 19,1826. Father of Josette Sophia Harris Moore, William M. Harris, Charles H. Harris, Alfred Wallace Harris, Henry William Harris, and John E. Harris. Married to Martha Buckman Harris in Jefferson County on July 26, 1849. Married to Emily T. Day Harris in Jefferson County on June 4, 1861. Merchant in Louisville in 1850. Louisville city assessor in Louisville from 1860 to 1873.
